price: Kuma kõwane mutum Mun lazimta masa abin rekõdinsa a cikin wuyansa, kuma Mu fitar masa a Rãnar ¡iyãma da littãfi wanda zai haɗu da shi buɗaɗɗe.
arabic: وَكُلَّ إِنسَٰنٍ أَلۡزَمۡنَٰهُ طَٰٓئِرَهُۥ فِي عُنُقِهِۦۖ وَنُخۡرِجُ لَهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ كِتَٰبٗا يَلۡقَىٰهُ مَنشُورًا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakulla insānin alzamnāhu ṭāirahu fī ʿunuqihi wanukh'riju lahu yawma al-qiyāmati kitāban yalqāhu manshūran
